briefTitle: Randomized Controlled Trial of Treatment of Male Partners of Women With BV
officialTitle: Randomized Controlled Trial of Treatment of Male Partners of Women With BV
summary: Male partners of womoen with recurrent bacteria vaginosis are randomized to treatment with metronidazole or placebo to compare the rates of recurrent BV in the women

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Female Partners Whose Male Partners Received Metronidazole Versus Females Whose Male Partners Did Not Receive Metrodiazole With Recurrence of BV in the Female
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 16 weeks post start of receipt of study drug
